4/*
5 * Author: Tatu Ylonen <ylo@cs.hut.fi>
6 * Copyright (c) 1995 Tatu Ylonen <ylo@cs.hut.fi>, Espoo, Finland
7 * All rights reserved
8 * Functions for allocating a pseudo-terminal and making it the controlling
9 * tty.
10 *
11 * As far as I am concerned, the code I have written for this software
12 * can be used freely for any purpose. Any derived versions of this
13 * software must be clearly marked as such, and if the derived work is
14 * incompatible with the protocol description in the RFC file, it must be
15 * called by a name other than "ssh" or "Secure Shell".
16 */
17
18#include <termios.h>
19
20struct termios *get_saved_tio(void);
21void leave_raw_mode(int);
22void enter_raw_mode(int);
23
24int pty_allocate(int *, int *, char *, size_t);
25void pty_release(const char *);
26void pty_make_controlling_tty(int *, const char *);
27void pty_change_window_size(int, u_int, u_int, u_int, u_int);
28void pty_setowner(struct passwd *, const char *);
29void disconnect_controlling_tty(void);
